channel.title: Make the game more about deceit
channel.description:
I think the current game main problem is that you can't lie before the **critical stage** of the game: When you win if your suggested target get voted out.
There are 2 ways to fix this: 1) People who get executed won't get their class revealed until the end of the game. 2) the mm/cl will have a day ability that will do (1) for 1 day (3 uses).
Sure, this can be added with a buff to bd (for example, add unique unconvertable sheriff, that now unseen can claim they are!) , but this can make the game much more interesting.
MM dead? noone knows. the outed sheriff is the real sheriff? noone know, there are still a possessor/reaper? The drunk lied?
**Edit, as you suggested, there is a third option** **Day ability:** Defile(mm,cl)- make a player executed at day appeared like another class (3 uses), can be used on yourself.

item.title: Make the game more about deceit
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Seeker and sage then? Because I don’t want MM, Assassin or CL to have a move that powerful and it is relitively common for there to be an Herbalist or Sage in an Unseen game.

Its not common to have those because alot of the time you don’t have 3 unseen members.
The point is being able to lie in the game. Your idea is to claim later: “no it was a sage”, those claims will just get you killed anyway because it’s rare to have a sage, and in the games you have a sage the sherif will just be executed after he find an unseen, and the mm will be alive until the end.

So when you are giving it to sage, the unseen will be super poweful with sage, and weak without a sage

It should be given to mm/seeker or mm/cl, and come with a buff to BD.
